# IOPMPowerState | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Kernel ](/documentation/kernel)

- [ Driver Support ](/documentation/kernel/driver_support)

- [ IOPMPowerState ](/documentation/kernel/iopmpowerstate)

- [ Driver Support ](/documentation/kernel/driver_support)

-  IOPMPowerState 

Structure# IOPMPowerState

macOS 10.0+

```
typedef struct IOPMPowerState {
    ...
} IOPMPowerState;
```

## [Topics](/documentation/kernel/iopmpowerstate#topics)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/kernel/iopmpowerstate#3721585)

[`capabilityFlags`](/documentation/kernel/iopmpowerstate/1386965-capabilityflags)Describes the capability of the device in this state.[`inputPowerRequirement`](/documentation/kernel/iopmpowerstate/1386979-inputpowerrequirement)Describes the input power required in this state.[`outputPowerCharacter`](/documentation/kernel/iopmpowerstate/1386991-outputpowercharacter)Describes the power provided in this state.[`powerDomainBudget`](/documentation/kernel/iopmpowerstate/1386971-powerdomainbudget)Describes power in milliWatts a domain in this state can deliver to its children. Unused; drivers may specify 0. }[`powerToAttain`](/documentation/kernel/iopmpowerstate/1386975-powertoattain)Describes dditional power to attain this state from next lower state (in milliWatts). Unused; drivers may specify 0.[`settleDownTime`](/documentation/kernel/iopmpowerstate/1386983-settledowntime)Settle time required after entering next lower state from this state (microseconds). Unused; drivers may specify 0.[`settleUpTime`](/documentation/kernel/iopmpowerstate/1386989-settleuptime)Describes settle time required after entering this state from next lower state (microseconds). Unused; drivers may specify 0.[`stateOrder`](/documentation/kernel/iopmpowerstate/1386977-stateorder)Valid in version kIOPMPowerStateVersion2 or greater of this structure. Defines ordering of power states independently of the power state ordinal.[`staticPower`](/documentation/kernel/iopmpowerstate/1386967-staticpower)Describes average consumption in milliwatts. Unused; drivers may specify 0.[`timeToAttain`](/documentation/kernel/iopmpowerstate/1386973-timetoattain)Describes time required to enter this state from next lower state (in microseconds). Unused; drivers may specify 0.[`timeToLower`](/documentation/kernel/iopmpowerstate/1386981-timetolower)Describes time required to enter next lower state from this one (microseconds). Unused; drivers may specify 0.[`version`](/documentation/kernel/iopmpowerstate/1386987-version)Defines version number of this struct. Just use the value "1" when defining an IOPMPowerState.## [See Also](/documentation/kernel/iopmpowerstate#see-also)
